Fuck, is either racist because there's a black dude or racist because it's been bleached out (there is a reupload with a white dude instead).

Let me throw it at y'all straight: even to this day Japan has still to grow out of some racist stereotypes in general. Do you think the shit that china pulled during the pandemic of not allowing black individuals into stores ends at the CCP's border? nope, that's just some shit that happens around that corner of the world because (dumb) reasons.

So, back to the doujin, the same way we have the (also racially biased) BBC stereotypes for porn they have their own when it comes to foreigners with "someone of their own". The fact that it appears in NTR might be a mix of societal PTSD for losing the war (aka. getting cucked) and to whom they lost it to (in this case a black dude, but I can assure you there is a NTR with a blonde blue-eyed "strong and superior" american dude)

Why is the kid so blond? He's not white, he's Japanese. And for that matter, his mother is a darker hair color. So either he bleached it blonde (seems unlikely given his background) or he has a blonde/blue eyed father. So here we have either a half Japanese/half white kid or a kid who bleached his hair and wears contacts.  And none of this would matter if the entire comic didn't hinge around racial stereotypes. Was better uncolored because of these inconsistencies :/
